dt-example.title: Basic initialisation
dt-example.info:
AutoFill gives an Excel like option to a DataTable to click and drag over multiple cells, filling in information over the selected cells and incrementing numbers as needed.
AutoFill is initialised using the `af-init autoFill` option as shown in the example below. This can be set to be `true` to use the AutoFill configuration defaults, or used as an object to specify options.
